version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: Initial beta release

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: New WAV writer functions by Xenakios. Fixed bug in JS_Window_GetRelated.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * New function: JS_Window_SetOpacity. * New function: JS_Window_GetClassName. * Extension loads properly in Linux.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * Safety check for JS_Window_SetOpacity (only apply to framed parent windows).

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * New functions: Browse for files and folders. * New functions: Various ListView. * New function: FindChildByID. * Changed functions: Functions that previously stored strings in ExtStates, now return the strings directly. * Requirements: On Windows OS, C++ redistributable not required anymore. * Requirements: REAPER v5.965 or later.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * Find window functions: Fix bug for macOS. * LoadCursorFromFile: new optional parameter to re-use cursors. * Window_FindEx.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * JS_Window_IsWindow implemented on macOS and Linux.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * BrowseForOpenFiles: On Windows, returns folder with terminal backslash. * All file dialogs: On Windows, accept forward slashes in initial folder. * IsWindow function: Improved on Linux and macOS. * New functions: Memory allocation and access. * Deprecated function: StrToPtr. * WindowMessage functions: Recognize ComboBox message names such as "CB_GETCURSEL".

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * Fix possible memory access error in file dialogs.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * WindowsOS: Enable confirmation dialogs for file functions. * macOS: Fix GetClientRect. * GDI: macOS and Linux use same color format as WindowsOS. * New: Window_GetLong, MonitorFromRect, GetClientSize.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * New JS_Composite functions for compositing LICE bitmaps into REAPER windows. * New JS_VKeys functions for intercepting virtual keys / keyboard input. * GDI blitting: Enable per-pixel alpha blending (except on Linux).

version.name: 0.980a
version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * New JS_Composite functions for compositing LICE bitmaps into REAPER windows. * New JS_VKeys functions for intercepting virtual keys / keyboard input. * GDI blitting: Enable per-pixel alpha blending (except on Linux).

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * JS_GDI: Improved handling of GDI HDCs. * JS_Composite: Composited bitmaps can automatically stretch to fill destination windows. * JS_WindowMessage: Large pointer values can be Sent and Posted.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * New Xen_ functions for audio preview. * JS_Composite: Some improvements, including src and dest RECTs can be changed without first unlinking.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * Hotfix for keyboard intercepts on macOS. [p=2121089]

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * VKeys: Keyboard intercepts are first in queue, so work in MIDI editor too. * VKeys: Cutoff time, new functions for KeyUp and KeyDown. * LICE: MeasureText. * BrowseForOpenFiles: On WindowsOS, prevent creation of new files.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * New function: JS_LICE_WritePNG

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * New functions and options for color processing LICE bitmaps: * LICE_Blit options "BLUR", "ALPHAMUL" and "CHANCOPY_XTOY" * LICE_ProcessRect * LICE_AlterRect/BitmapHSV

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * New: JS_Mouse_GetCursor

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * Fix: Help text for Window_Find. * New: Window_FindTop.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * Fix: Window_SetOpacity works on macOS. * New: JS_Window_Create. * New: JS_ListView_EnsureVisible. * New: More options for Window_Show. * New: JS_Window_SetZOrder options work on macOS.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * New: JS_Window_SetStyle: Change frame styles of gfx and other windows. * Improved: JS_Window_SetPosition: Full functionality of SetWindowPos. * Improved: Xen_StartSourcePreview: Add support for setting hardware output channels for PCM_source previews.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * Support Unicode characters for file dialog functions, SetTitle, GetClassName, and GDI_DrawText. GetTitle does not yet work for all Unicode. * VKeys functions ignore repeated KEYDOWNs.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * VKeys functions: Improved disregard auto-repeated KEYDOWN messages.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * Fixed: Script-created windows crashing when subclassing.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * Fixed: Script-created windows crashing when subclassing.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * JS_Window_SetParent

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * JS_WindowMessage_Send and _Post behave similarly when message is being intercepted by scripts.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * Linux: Proper linking against GDK.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * JS_Window functions: On Linux and macOS, don't crash if handle is invalid. * JS_Mouse_LoadCursorFromFile: On Windows, accept Unicode paths. * JS_GDI_ReleaseDC: Can release screen HDCs.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * Composite, Composite_Unlink and DestroyBitmap automatically update and re-draw window. * Composite_Unlink can optionally unlink all bitmaps from window. * JS_LICE_List/ArrayAllBitmaps. * JS_Window_EnableMetal to check Metal mode on macOS.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * Safely delete resources if REAPER is closed while script is running.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * Linux and macOS: JS_Window_GetForeground returns top-level window. * Linux and macOS: Various tweaks in JS_Composite to reduce glitching. * WindowsOS: New JS_Composite_Delay function to reduce flickering. * JS_Composite: Auto-update now optional parameter.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * Better handling of partially invalidated composited windows.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * macOS: JS_Window_EnableMetal returns correct modes. * macOS: Compositing still doesn't work if Metal graphics is enabled.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * Fixed: LICE_WritePNG when image has transparency. * New: LICE_LoadJPG, LICE_WriteJPG. * Updated: If Metal graphics, JS_Composite clips to client area.

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * New: Various ListView functions * New: JS_File_Stat

version.author: juliansader
version.changelog: * New: Functions for editing action shortcuts. * Changed: SetParent accepts null parent on WindowsOS.

version.author: brumbear
version.changelog: - added CUSTOM ACTIONS functionality - user editable configuration file
